Name: Belize District
Description: Home to the largest city, Belize City, and the main commercial and cultural hub.

Name: Cayo District
Description: Known for its ecotourism, Mayan ruins, and the capital city, Belmopan.

Name: Corozal District
Description: A northern district with strong ties to Mexico, known for its beaches and Free Zone.

Name: Orange Walk District
Description: A sugar-producing region with rich Mayan heritage, including the Lamanai ruins.

Name: Stann Creek District
Description: Known for its Garifuna culture, tourism, and coastal towns like Dangriga and Placencia.

Name: Toledo District
Description: The southernmost and least developed district, rich in rainforest and indigenous Maya culture.
